Looking out the windows of the ship, I see nothing but darkness. It stretches to infinity. There is no sun or stars, just blackness. Like the world can sense my nightmare, my humanity I forfeit in that abyssal place. I'm supposed to help people, make people better, instead, I'm just as greedy and callous as the rest. Though I must admit, the darkness is slightly better than before.

And then a creature attacked the ship. It was red and made a horrible sound. It damaged the glass. Luckily, I saw a village just beneath me. I've landed nearby and I'm hoping there is some merchant or trader I can purchase supplies.
I hope those flying creatures don't attack me before I get there.
